document_data.name: Lair of the Night Masters
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lair of the Night Masters''' was the secret lair of [[Manshoon]] and his [[vampire]] associates during the time he led the [[Night Masks]] in the guise of [[Manshoon|Orbakh]].
document_data.Geography: The lair was located in [[Westgate]]'s sewers and could only be entered through the secret back entrance in a trapped tunnel.
document_data.Structure: The lair had several coffins which were fakes designed to fool thieves and to cower lower-ranking Night Masks. A trapped [[teleport|teleporter]] led to Orbakh's audience chamber.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|2379}}
document_data.History: The main entrance had been destroyed around [[1391 DR]] by the [[Eye of Justice]].
